{"id":1027467494,"question_id":3018,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"9 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1692609198,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"6 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1027467494/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Make String a Subsequence Using Cyclic Increments","memory":"44.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean canMakeSubsequence(String str1, String str2) {\n        \n        \n        int i1=0, i2=0;\n        int len1 = str1.length();\n        int len2 = str2.length();\n        \n        if(len1 < len2) \n            return false;\n        \n        \n        while(i1<len1 && i2<len2){\n            \n            char ch1 = str1.charAt(i1);\n            char ch2 = str2.charAt(i2);\n            \n            while(ch1 !=ch2 && (ch1+1-'a')%26+'a'!=ch2){\n                i1++;\n                \n                if(i1>=len1)\n                    break;\n                ch1 = str1.charAt(i1);\n            }\n                \n            \n            if(ch1==ch2 || (ch1+1-'a')%26+'a'==ch2){\n                i2++;\n                i1++;\n            }\n                \n            \n            if(i2==len2)\n                return true;\n            \n        }\n        \n        return i2==len2;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"make-string-a-subsequence-using-cyclic-increments","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
